data.title: Official Court-Authorized Website - Class Member TIN Registration
data.text:
Provide TIN

Proof of Authorization documentation showing you have authority to act on behalf of the TIN you provided is required before you can submit a Claim. If available, please upload your Proof of Authorization below. If you do not have that documentation available now, you may be contacted by the Class Administrator and asked to provide it at a later date.

Please upload your documentation below. Documents should be clear, readable copies.

Each file must be less than 20 MB and in one of the following formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, tif, tiff, or pdf.
